description: To provide scholarships to help defray the costs of attending UCO, which may include but not be limited to the payment for books, rooming, parking fees or tuition. Eligibility Requirements Must be a full-time undergraduate student at UCO Member in good standing of the Delta Zeta Sorority Minimum grade point average of 2.5 This scholarship is available to apply for during the Current UCO Student Application.

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration
